languages.text: В случае, если древнее зенитное орудие в руках мятежников будет уничтожено, Лорд-капитан сможет добраться до командного пункта на шаттле, минуя опасности, поджидающие на улицах города.

traits.locale_text: В случае, если археотех-орудие в руках мятежников будет уничтожено, Лорд-капитан сможет добраться до командного пункта на шаттле, минуя опасности, поджидающие на улицах города.

languages.text: If the ancient anti-aircraft battery captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, the Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.
languages.original_text: В случае, если древнее зенитное орудие в руках мятежников будет уничтожено, Лорд-капитан сможет добраться до командного пункта на шаттле, минуя опасности, поджидающие на улицах города.

traits.locale_text: If the ancient cannon captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.
If the ancient cannon captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, the Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.
If the ancient cannon captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, the Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.

If the ancient anti-aircraft battery captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, the Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.

languages.text: Würde das von den Rebellen eroberte alte Flugabwerhgeschütz zerstört, könnte der Lord Captain mit einem Shuttle die Befehlszentrale erreichen und die Gefahren auf den Straßen der Stadt umgehen.
languages.original_text: If the ancient anti-aircraft battery captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, the Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.

traits.locale_text: Würde die von den Rebellen eroberte alte Kanone zerstört, könnte der Lord Captain mit einem Shuttle die Befehlszentrale erreichen und die Gefahren auf den Straßen der Stadt umgehen.

languages.text: Si l'ancienne batterie antiaérienne qu'ont capturée les rebelles devait être détruite, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} pourrait alors se rendre au centre de commandement en navette et ainsi éviter les dangers qui l'attendent dans les rues de la ville.
languages.original_text: If the ancient anti-aircraft battery captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, the Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.

traits.locale_text: Si le canon ancien qu'ont capturé les rebelles devait être détruit, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} pourrait alors se rendre au centre de commandement en navette et ainsi éviter les dangers qui l'attendent dans les rues de la ville.

languages.text: 反乱軍に奪われた古代の対空砲が破壊されれば、ロード・キャプテンはシャトル内の司令部に到着し、街中で待ち構えている危険を回避できるだろう。
languages.original_text: If the ancient anti-aircraft battery captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, the Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.

traits.locale_text: 反乱軍に奪われた古代の対空砲が破壊されれば、ロード・キャプテンはシャトル内の司令部に到着し、街中で待ち構えている危険を回避できるだろう。

languages.text: Si destruye la batería antiaérea antigua en manos de los rebeldes, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán podrá llegar al centro de mando en lanzadera, evitando los peligros que acechan en las calles.
languages.original_text: If the ancient anti-aircraft battery captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, the Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.

traits.locale_text: Si destruye el cañón antiguo en manos de los rebeldes, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán podrá llegar al centro de mando en lanzadera, evitando los peligros que acechan en las calles.

languages.text: 只要摧毁了叛军手中的古老防空炮，领主舰长就可以乘坐穿梭机抵达指挥中心，避开城区街道上潜伏的无数危险。
languages.original_text: If the ancient anti-aircraft battery captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, the Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.

traits.locale_text: 只要摧毁了叛军手中的古老防空炮，领主舰长就可以乘坐穿梭机抵达指挥中心，避开城区街道上潜伏的无数危险。

languages.text: İsyancıların ele geçirdiği kadim havasavar bataryası imha edilirse Lord Kaptan da şehrin sokaklarında kol gezen tehlikelere bulaşmadan komuta merkezine doğrudan mekikle ulaşabilir.
languages.original_text: If the ancient anti-aircraft battery captured by the rebels were to be destroyed, the Lord Captain would be able to reach the command centre on a shuttle, bypassing the dangers lying in wait on the city streets.

traits.locale_text: İsyancıların ele geçirdiği kadim havasavar bataryası imha edilirse Lord Kaptan da şehrin sokaklarında kol gezen tehlikelere bulaşmadan komuta merkezine doğrudan mekikle ulaşabilir.
